item.title: about me
item.description: education Bachelor of Applied Science in Honors Mechatronics Engineering with Co-op from the University of Waterloo, Waterloo, ON. (April 2022) skills the languages i’ve worked with (from most experience to least experience) are C# Python C++ C HLSL (Microsoft’s High-Level Shader Language) Java Go HTML, CSS, XML, Markdown Javascript SQL YAML the frameworks and libraries I’ve used are Unity NUnit, testNG ROS (Robot Operating System) Arduino Azure Jenkins Ansible Hugo Latex some of my other sills include

item.title: fun stuff i'm working on
item.description: If you want to see some of the code I’ve written, check out my Github profile. Mint++ Mint++ is a budget tracker based on Intuit’s Mint, a popular budgeting app. This ongoing project adds features that are missing from Mint, such as: Tracking debts that don’t exist in an account, such as as family loan; Adding more information to the budgeting categories, showing what is a subcategory of what; Changing how rollover balances (a.

item.title: get in touch
item.description: The best way to contact me is through email. You can reach me at camille.h.walters@gmail.com Alternatively, you can find me on LinkedIn here.
